The misleading name of the Facebook page: CCTV In Pune' suggests that the incident occurred in Pune, India, when in fact it took place in Liquan County, Shaanxi Province, China.
By breaking the video into key: frames and performing a Google reverse image search, it was discovered that the video is related to a car explosion in China, not the claimed incident involving a perfume sprayed near a smoking cigarette.
Newsflare and China Global Television Ne: confirming that it took place in China and resulted in the death of the driver.
